_comment: recopilatory information of project built by me. TECHNOLOGIES: main tech used (no more that 5), MAIN: will be show in main project, if not itll be show on a second part. SHOW: if false will not be render

projects.name: PokeApp
projects.description: A short project of a complete app, including the API and the client. Its aim was to create an interactive database for Pokémon’s fans implementing the technologies learned at Henry Bootcamp.

projects.name: Movies App
projects.description: A nice project that permit to find all movies saved on the OMDb API and save your favorite ones

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: My first project using React.js. It allow to get Weather Data from any city in the world
